item.title: About
item.description: About # Seattle based multi-medium artist & professor.

item.title: Exhibitions
item.description: Exhibitions # Information If you would like to be notified of upcoming exhibitions, sign up for the mailing list Here. Ongoing Event This event is running at LOCATION between the dates 2024-08-08 and 2024-08-14. Saint-Briac-Sur-Mer, France. 2024 # In collaboration with Chantal Blanchy. Edison, Washington, United States. 2022 # The brush in the medium of sumi only paints lines and dots. Theses strokes evoke the rain, sky, horizons of my paintings.
